name: zk-proof-certificates
description: Privacy-preserving bulk degree certificate generation and verification system using Zero-Knowledge Proofs

scripts.setup-ptau: cd circuits && snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 14 pot14_0000.ptau && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot14_0000.ptau pot14_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -e="random text" && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot14_0001.ptau pot14_final.ptau -v
scripts.generate-keys: cd circuits && snarkjs groth16 setup certificate.r1cs pot14_final.ptau certificate_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute certificate_0000.zkey certificate_0001.zkey --name="First contribution" -e="Another random text" && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey certificate_0001.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run node" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"

author: ZK Certificate Team
